'''Marsh Davies''' is a former creative communications manager at [[Mojang Studios]].

== Career ==
Marsh appeared in a video called [[Can a Mojang Employee Survive the Night in a REAL Forest?]], which aired at ''[[MINECON Earth 2017]]''.

On April 27, 2018, he announced his departure from Mojang.<ref>[https://web.archive.org/web/20190710102806/https://twitter.com/MarshDavies/status/989859004275937280 Hello I have a news]</ref>
